attributes.comment:
The proposed fee increases will price many applicants out of the market. This is
especially true for those applying for naturalization. In the past, CIS has proposed
more modest fee increases to cover costs and improve customer service. These
increases are huge and, since they are proposed to be implemented "all at once"
will make it much more difficult for immigrants and their families to avail
themselves of benefits for which they may qualify. I oppose the government's new
fee schedule. I believe there should be some evidence that the revenue
generated by these fee increases will indeed improve customer service before the
new fee schedule becomes law. Thank you for considering this comment.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Diane Mahoney
